SFLogic
Class SpamAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  SFLogic.SpamAnalyzer

public class SpamAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object

The steps of Baysian Filter 1. Incoming message (e-mail) 2. Message tokenization 3. Probability estimation 4. Feature selection 5. Decide by Naive Bayesian classifier
